document_data.mainbody:
he Jhalahaskur family was one of the twenty Onsruur families that made up the hereditary council of lords in Khôltar, south Faerûn, circa the Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR.
The Jhalahaskur bloodline tended to be tall and strong, with blond or light-colored hair. They favored the martial arts and the proper application of force.
This family invested in costers and mercenary companies, and did not shy away from the slavery business. Their primary business was in selling weapons.
